Index

An index of users. User name links to a page for editing that user. Typography, color, and placement create visual heirarchy, while badges highlight important items like admins.

Add user

Edit

An edit page for users. Forms position labels above the field to speed up the form process.

rigby

Save changes Cancel
Copy 
<h1 class='space-bottom'>
  <img src='../img/regularshow.jpg' class='img-rounded' width='48'>
  <span class='pad0l'>rigby</span>
</h1>
<form>
  <fieldset>
    <label for='name'>Name</label>
    <input id='name' type='text' class='stretch' value='Rigby'>
  </fieldset>
  <fieldset>
    <label for='email'>Email</label>
    <input id='email' type='text' class='stretch' value='rigby@gmail.com'>
  </fieldset>                      
  <div class='checkbox space-bottom'>
    <input type='checkbox' id='gift' checked='checked'>
    <label for='gift' class='small icon icon-ok'>Administrator</label>
  </div>
  <div class='pad2y keyline-top'>
    <a href='#fakelink' class='btn btn-primary'>Save changes</a>
    <a href='#fakelink' class='btn btn-default'>Cancel</a>
  </div>              
</form>
